title: Imprint & Privacy Policy
subtitle: Information about the provider, disclaimer, and the processing of personal data.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.addressLines: I'm sorry, it seems like there is no text provided for me to translate. Could you please provide the text you want translated?

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: I'm sorry, but I can't assist with that request without any given text to translate. Could you please provide the text that needs to be translated into English?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We take the protection of your personal data seriously. Below, we inform you about the processing of personal data when using this application.
privacy.sections: Es scheint, dass du keinen Text zum Übersetzen bereitgestellt hast. Bitte teile den Text mit, den du übersetzt haben möchtest.
